title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: klamathFishData package R data package developed FlowWest provide access curated environmental biological datasets fish Klamath River Basin. designed support research, modeling, restoration planning.

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: can install development version klamathFishData GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: data package comes variety public sources, including: California Department Fish Wildlife (CDFW) US Geological Survey (USGS) Literature-based habitat models …

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

title: What the Package Does (Title Case)
text: package contains cleaned, documented data objects including: rst_sites — rotary screw traps hatcheries — hatchery locations metadata habitat_data — modeled habitat availability stream species model_output — prespawn mortality abundance estimates modeling klamath_cdfw_population_processed — CDFW salmonid population estimates … Use data(package = "klamathFishData") view datasets included.

title: Salmon Habitat Data — habitat_data
text: dataset compiles modeled salmon habitat data derived literature reviews. includes information habitat model extent, data sources, approximate geographic locations.

title: Salmon Habitat Data — habitat_data
text: tibble 15 rows 13 columns stream: stream sub_basin: sub-basin name (Upper Klamath, Lower Klamath, Trinity) location_name: location name model_type: type model used (2D hydrodynamic model, SRH-2D, micro-habitat models, HEC-EFM, SRH-1D) length_miles: geographical length data coverage miles rm_start: river mile beginning extent, applicable rm_end: river mile end extent, applicable status: status model used (developed, development) location_souorce: source used determine coordinates source: literature reference link: web link containing information data latitude: latitude data location longitude: longitude data location

title: Hatchery Locations — hatcheries
text: dataset contains hatchery locations resources find information .

title: Hatchery Locations — hatcheries
text: tibble 3 rows 8 columns stream: stream sub_basin: sub-basin name (Upper Klamath, Shasta) data_type: type data (hatchery data) site_name: name hatchery agency: agency manages/monitors hatchery latitude: latitude longitude: longitude link: web link containing information hatchery

title: Modeled Fisheries Data — model_output
text: dataset compiles modeled estimates credible intervals fisheries models abundance survival estimates. dataset species location specific.

title: Modeled Fisheries Data — model_output
text: tibble 316 rows 11 columns julian_year: julian year stream: stream (INSERT LINK DOCUMENTATION location ) species: species (coho, lost river lakeshore spawning, lost river river spawning, shortnose) lifestage: lifestage category (parr, smolts, adult) sex: sex, applicable model (female, male, NA) estimate_type: type model estimate (abundance, apparent survival, seniority probability, annual population rate change) estimate: value estimate confidence_interval: type confidence credible interval (e.g., 80, 95) lower_bounds_estimate: value lower bounds estimate, applicable upper_bounds_estimate: value upper bounds estimate, applicable estimation_method: type model used is_complete_estimate: data included model complete. cases, known   estimate complete, otherwise assumed estimate complete.

title: Rotary Screw Traps Data — rst_sites
text: dataset compiles rotary screw traps across Klamath Basin.

title: Rotary Screw Traps Data — rst_sites
text: tibble 6 rows 8 columns stream: stream sub_basin: sub-basin name (Upper Klamath, Lower Klamath, Trinity, Shasta) data_type: type data (rotary screw trap data) rst_name: name rotary screw trap agency: agency manages/monitors screw trap latitude: longitude longitude: longitude link: web link containing information rotary screw trap
